description:
Ultimate protection from the harshest of winter conditions is the goal for the Howler Markus skully. Designed for the most extreme environments, this skully helps combat Mother Nature and falling mercury levels.

  • Fully wind-resistant shaped skully
  • Laser cut ear holes improve hearing
  • Small side eye wear opening
  • Integrated stretch back panel helps improve fit and expansion
  • N98 Active heat generating fleece lining
  • Lycra binding helps provide a secure fit
name: CTR Howler Markus Skully - Unisex
